scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:check-hosts && npm run prepare:ssl-certificates
scripts.prepare:check-hosts: if [ ! -f /etc/hosts ]; then echo '\033[37;1;41m Your system has not /etc/hosts file. Please add \\'127.0.0.1    pepo.local\\' to your hosts manually \033[0m'; else npm run prepare:add-to-hosts; fi
scripts.prepare:add-to-hosts: if grep -q pepo.local /etc/hosts; then echo '\033[37;1;42m Hosts are ok \033[0m'; else echo -en '\033[37;1;41m You must add pepo.local to your hosts file \033[0m'; exit 1; fi
scripts.prepare:ssl-certificates: if [ ! -f server.key ]; then openssl req  -nodes -new -x509 -keyout server.key -out server.crt; fi
scripts.precommit: npm run precommit:js && npm run precommit:styles
scripts.test: echo "Guys you should setup tests for testing =)" && exit 0
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:styles
scripts.precommit:js: git diff-index --cached HEAD --name-only --diff-filter ACMR | grep -E "\.js$" | xargs $(npm bin)/eslint
scripts.precommit:styles: git diff-index --cached HEAD --name-only --diff-filter ACMR | grep -E "\.styl$" | xargs $(npm bin)/stylint
